title: Lamatic.ai
description:
A managed PaaS with a low-code visual builder, VectorDB, and integrations to apps and models for building, testing, and deploying GenAI apps on edge.

	•	Flow Builder 🛠️: Role-based UI for visibility.
	•	Integrations 🔗: Drag-and-drop for data, LLMs, and tools.
	•	Edge, Proxy & Cache 🌐: Speedy, scalable routing.
	•	VectorDB 📚: Powered by Weaviate.
	•	Monitoring 📊: Real-time logs and insights.
	•	GraphQL & Webhooks ⚙️: Seamless integration.
	•	Widgets 💬: Embed chat, search, and more.
